S02sjdh_u:3: ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma,
S02sjdh_u:4_0: gṛdhrakūṭe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhir bhikṣuśatair evaṃ pramukhaiś
S02sjdh_u:5_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃś catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ arcanādisaṃskṛtas
S02sjdh_u:6: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritāyan prabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātun mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt //
S02sjdh_u:8_0: atha ratnavairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S02sjdh_u:8_1: sahasā sthāyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S02sjdh_u:8_2: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02sjdh_u:9: paramāścaryābhūt tatprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan kuta ime raśmaya āgatāḥ?
S02sjdh_u:14: ito buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasragaṅgānadīvālukāsamān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātu nānāguṇaratnavibhūṣitā nānāratnakūṭāgārādivṛkṣapuṣpakariṇyupaśobhitā /
S02sjdh_u:15: yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ padmottaratathāgataḥ sakāśad dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
S02sjdh_u:16: tatra lokadhātau indro nāma mahābodhivṛkṣaratnamayāny asti /
S02sjdh_u:19: tatra padmāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvāḥ tasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti /
S02sjdh_u:20: te sarvalokadhātubhyaḥ āgatā bodhisattvās tāṃ pūjayitvā tatra sthitāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:22_0: atha padmottaratathāgatas teṣāṃ āśayānuśayaṃ jñātvā bahujanahitāya sukhāya lokānukampāya
S02sjdh_u:22_1: devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca hitāya mahāyānasya paripūraṇārtham avaivartikadharmacakraṃ pravartitavān /
S02sjdh_u:24: bhagavan kiyac ciraṃ sā lokadhātuḥ padmottaras tathāgatas tiṣṭhati saddharmaṃ vā /
S02sjdh_u:28: ye yatra jātā bodhisattvās teṣāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāyuṣpramāṇaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:29: pūrvañ ca kulaputra sā lokadhātuś candanā nāma babhūva /
S02sjdh_u:30: na tv evaṃ pariśuddhā nākīrṇaśuddhasattvā yathaitarhi sā lokadhātuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:31: kulaputra candanāyāṃ lokadhātau candrottamo nāmābhūt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvat sa cāpi viṃśatyantarakalpān dharmaṃ deśayitavān /
S02sjdh_u:32: tasya parinirvāṇakālasamaye cāpy ekatyā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyadbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāntāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:34: adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamas tathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S02sjdh_u:37: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaganamudro nāma bodhisattvaḥ sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatena vyākṛtaḥ /
S02sjdh_u:38: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati;
S02sjdh_u:40: tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase,
S02sjdh_u:42: tatkāle ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamas tathāgatas tenopajagmuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:43: upetya te sarve nānāprakārair bodhisattvavikurvaiś candrottamasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam etad avocan /
S02sjdh_u:44: icchāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavann ime daśāntarakalpā nirodham avahitena cittenātināmayituṃ /
S02sjdh_u:45: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamas tathāgato gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam āmantryaitad avocat /
S02sjdh_u:46: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ kulaputremaṃ sarvajñātākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvātītānāgatais tathāgataiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ deśitaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:47: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhantas te 'pi deśayanti /
S02sjdh_u:48: ye bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi yauvarājyābhiṣiktabodhisattvānāṃ deśayiṣyanti / tadyathā;
S02sjdh_u:50: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke saṃmade mahāsaṃmade,
S02sjdh_u:51: devām aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭharaṭharkke amimakasi hili cili tili ruruke mahāruruke,
S02sjdh_u:52: jaya durjaye jaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi,
S02sjdh_u:60: ārakṣa dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadam idaṃ / SjDh_1
S02sjdh_u:69: gupte śubhaprabhe tatphale agraphale niṣphale nilaha amukta amukta nirmukte,
S02sjdh_u:124: some cande datve acala acala apare vicivale nipale pracacale [Page 12] prasare,
S02sjdh_u:127: drāme nijaso grakkrame nayane indriyāṇāṃ balānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ / SjDh_7
S02sjdh_u:136: nayasaṃgṛhīte ca yukte succhendena saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ / SjDh_8
S02sjdh_u:147: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare pravare,
S02sjdh_u:168: bhare bhare bhunde bhire bhire ruṣare,
S02sjdh_u:191: samanantarārabdhe khalu punar bhagavatāsmiṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpitā;
S02sjdh_u:192: tathāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu sarve lokadhātavaḥ samapāṇītalajātā sphuṭā saṃdṛśyante /
S02sjdh_u:193_0: ye 'pi teṣv avasthitāḥ samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā bodhisattvās tathāgatabalena
S02sjdh_u:193_1: svakasvakeṣu [Page 14] buddhakṣetreṣv antarhitā imāṃ sahālokadhātum āgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe
S02sjdh_u:193_2: bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntās tasya pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakāraiḥ pūjāṃ
S02sjdh_u:194: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāś ca devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍamanuṣyakumbhāṇḍapiśācādayas sannipatitās te tatra padmābuddhakṣetraṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ tathāgataṃ ca paśyanti /
S02sjdh_u:195_1: bodhisattvair iyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātusthāṃ buddhān bhagavataś
S02sjdh_u:196: te āścaryaprāptā buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā samādhibalena tasthuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:198: imāṃ kulaputra dhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo bhāvayamānaś caturaśītidhāraṇīśatasahasrāṇi dvāsaptatiś ca ṣaṣṭiñ ca sahasrāṇi pratilabhate mahāmaitrīkaruṇādayaḥ /
S02sjdh_u:199: ye ca māṃ dhāraṇīṃ śroṣyanti te 'vaivartino bhaviṣyanti /
S02sjdh_u:200: ye likhiṣyanti te buddhadarśanena saddharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti /
S02sjdh_u:202: [Page 15] ye svādhyāyanti teṣāṃ sarvāṇy akarmāni parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
S02sjdh_u:203: ye bhāvayanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇy akarmāni naśyuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:206: ye parebhyaś ca vistareṇa bhāṣayanti te tathāgatā bhavanti //
S02sjdh_u:207: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat /
S02sjdh_u:208: yaiḥ khalu kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptāmaḥ /
S02sjdh_u:209: mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād imān dhāraṇīṃ prāptā,
S02sjdh_u:211: etarhy api mayā dhāritā vācitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā /
S02sjdh_u:212: evaṃ khalu maitreya yathā gaganamudrabodhisattvena candrottamatathāgatasya sakāśād imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ prāptā dhāritā vācitā,
S02sjdh_u:213_0: 'syā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena gaganamudro bodhisattvaḥ candrottamatathāgatasya parinirvāṇād
S02sjdh_u:213_1: yasyāṃ rātrau prathame yāme saddharmāntarhite tasyāṃ paścime yāme samyaksaṃbodhiṃ
S02sjdh_u:213_2: prāptā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau padmottara nāma tathāgato [Page 16] bhavati /
S02sjdh_u:214: tathā kulaputra mama sakāśād iyaṃ drāviḍamantrapadā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇī dhāraya vācaya vistareṇa parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśaya /
S02sjdh_u:215: asyāḥ prabhāvena maitreyāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
S02sjdh_u:216: tena te maitreyaitarhi mamāntikād yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
S02sjdh_u:217: yathātītānāṃ tathāgatānām antikād atītair bodhisattvair yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītāḥ //
S02sjdh_u:218: tatra khalu bhagavān sarvāvatīṃ parṣadam avalokya tasyāṃ velāyām imāni mantrapadāny abhāṣata / tadyathā:
S02sjdh_u:219: dāntabhūmiḥ damathabhūmiḥ smṛtibhūmiḥ prajñābhūmir vaiśāradyabhūmiḥ pratisaṃvidbhūmir anutkṣepabhūmiḥ samatāparikṣayopekṣabhūmir jātikṣayabhūmir muja vinmujaḥ,
S02sjdh_u:225: vimati vimati yopahira regamata vasisakrama iticoravate,
S02sjdh_u:226: makhe mudra daharavate prajñākṣā bubu dahakramitā sadoṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭā amundhamaṃ arthavati,
S02sjdh_u:230: iṭe iṭabale [Page 17] atra tatra kuruṣaṃ laruṣaṃ,
S02sjdh_u:231: latatha katha sarvanta sarvantavaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhatambi,
S02sjdh_u:235: api devānāṃ bhagavāṃ pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktāny adhimuktipadāni prakāśayati,
S02sjdh_u:236: eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhir devanayutaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam abhūt / SjDh_11
S02sjdh_u:245: ebhir adhimuktipadair daśānāṃ devakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ sthitāḥ / SjDh_12
S02sjdh_u:252: ebhir adhimuktipadaiś catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ nāgasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni,
S02sjdh_u:268: ebhir adhimuktipadair dvādaśānāṃ yakṣakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ / SjDh_14
S02sjdh_u:298: vāciparikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati [Page 19] gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇabuddhiḥ,
S02sjdh_u:300: ebhir adhimuktipadair ṣaṭpañcāśānām asurasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni avaivartikāś ca vyavasthitāḥ / SjDh_15
S02sjdh_u:304_0: sattvānāṃ hitāya bodhisattvaguṇaniṣpādanārthaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
S02sjdh_u:304_1: caratā dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā parigṛhītā bahavo buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ,
S02sjdh_u:315: anekāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāñ caratā,
S02sjdh_u:322_0: mukhāc ca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya tasmāj jihvendriyāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo
S02sjdh_u:322_1: pramuktās taiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātur udāreṇāvabhāsena nirayatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ sphuṭā babhūvuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:323: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti,
S02sjdh_u:324: yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva /
S02sjdh_u:325: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhir lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītibhiś ca,
S02sjdh_u:326: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā buddhadarśanāpyāyitaśarīrā buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cintayanto,
S02sjdh_u:332: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya,
S02sjdh_u:334: tatas te nairayikās sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācam udīrayanti,
S02sjdh_u:335: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
S02sjdh_u:336: atha te sattvās tena cittaprasādakuśalamūlena tataś cyavitvā ekatyā deveṣūpapannā ekatyā manuṣyeṣu,
S02sjdh_u:338: ye śītanārakāṃ sattvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā vā sukhasamarpitā devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā evaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakṣu lokeṣu raśmayas saṃcodanti /
S02sjdh_u:339: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā karuṇāpuṇḍarīka nāma mahāyānasūtradharmaśravaṇāya /
S02sjdh_u:340: tena ca samayena gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyakāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayām āsuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:342: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
